testcase.name: in case of a draw, the artist report should consider the top artist to be the one added earliest

failure.message:
Too few invocations for:
1 * app.console.render { View view -> view.items == ["Artist Report", new Report(data:["Number of artists":"6", "Top artist":"Lana Del Rey", "Number of vinyls by Lana Del Rey": "1", "Number of songs by Lana Del Rey":"3"] ) ] } (0 invocations)
Unmatched invocations (ordered by similarity):
1 * <Console>.render(View: [Artist Report, Top artist: Pearl Jam Number of songs by Pearl Jam: 5 Number of vinyls by Pearl Jam: 2 Number of artists: 6])

testcase.failure:
Too few invocations for:
1 * app.console.render { View view -> view.items == ["Artist Report", new Report(data:["Number of artists":"6", "Top artist":"Lana Del Rey", "Number of vinyls by Lana Del Rey": "1", "Number of songs by Lana Del Rey":"3"] ) ] } (0 invocations)
Unmatched invocations (ordered by similarity):
1 * <Console>.render(View: [Artist Report, Top artist: Pearl Jam Number of songs by Pearl Jam: 5 Number of vinyls by Pearl Jam: 2 Number of artists: 6])

testcase.name: in case of a draw, the genre report should consider the top artist to be the one added earliest

failure.message:
Too few invocations for:
1 * app.console.render { View view -> view.items == ["Genre Report", new Report(data:["Number of genres":"4", "Top genre":"Pop", "Number of Pop vinyls": "2", "Number of Pop songs":"6"] ) ] } (0 invocations)
Unmatched invocations (ordered by similarity):
1 * <Console>.render(View: [Genre Report, Number of Rock vinyls: 3 Top genre: Rock Number of Rock songs: 7 Number of genres: 4])
